!Duelist Kaien: In *Gludio* you must face the *puncher and noble ant leader.* Punchers can be found in the Wastelands of southern Gludio. To find noble ants, you must go inside the Ant Nest of the Wastelands. I'm sure that with your skills you can adequately protect yourself... Bring back 10 puncher shards and 10 noble ant feelers! [Quest _222_TestOfDuelist 30623-09.htm|Tell me more.]
